headline: Hologic (HOLX) One-Off $277.8M Loss Undermines Recovery Narrative Despite Growth Forecasts
summary: Hologic (HOLX) reported a net profit margin of 13.8%, down from 19.6% in the previous year, with EPS declines averaging 26.7% per year over the last five years. The company’s most recent performance was affected by a one-off $277.8 million loss, while revenue is forecast to grow at 4.7% per year, notably slower than the US market’s 10.5% average. With the current share price at $74.11, trading below the estimated fair value of $105.96, investors are now weighing whether margin trends and the...
